code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const calculateProgress=()=>{const currentDate=new Date();const lastDayOfMonth=new Date(currentDate.getFullYear(),currentDate.getMonth()+1,0);const totalMillisecondsInMonth=lastDayOfMonth-currentDate;const remainingMilliseconds=lastDayOfMonth-currentDate;const progress=(totalMillisecondsInMonth-remainingMilliseconds)/totalMillisecondsInMonth*100;return progress;};const VALOSS=()=>{const progress=calculateProgress();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"bg-primary text-light p-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-md-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-3 mb-md-0",children:"Time Until New Competitive Season"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:'20px',backgroundColor:'#343a40',borderRadius:'4px',overflow:'hidden'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"".concat(progress,"%"),height:'100%',backgroundColor:'#28a745'}})})]})})});};export default VALOSS;
